Reversals∵

A Reversal resource represents a reversal of a Credit transaction. The amount of the reversal may be any value up to the amount of the original Credit.


Available Query Filters
amount

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=, in, !in

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

created_at

Available Operations: =, !=, <, <=, >, >=

Default Operation: =

Sortable: True

status

Available Operations: in, !in, =

Default Operation: in

Sortable: False

transaction_number

Available Operations: =, !=, startswith, endswith, contains, !contains, in, !in, ilike, !ilike

Default Operation: =

Sortable: False

Create a Reversal∵

Initiates a reversal for a Credit. A reversal can be for any amount less than or equal to the original Credit amount.

amount
optional integer. The amount in cents of this reversal
description
optional string. Free-text description of the reversal for the dashboard.
meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/credits/:credit_id/reversals

Balanced::Credit.reverse

balanced.Credit().reverse()

balanced.credit.reverse()

Credit().reverse()

Balanced\Credit->reverses->create()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/credits/CR5y9biY0Zr4Od8Jqu5DXimk/reversals \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -d "amount=3000" \
     -d "description=Reversal for Order #1111" \
     -d "meta[merchant.feedback]=positive" \
     -d "meta[user.refund_reason]=not happy with product" \
     -d "meta[fulfillment.item.condition]=OK"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

reversal = Balanced::Credit.fetch('/credits/CRl8vsIfwYjpcYnDk0K0ILQ')
credit.reverse(
  :amount => 3000,
  :description => 'Reversal for Order #1111',
  :meta => {
    'fulfillment.item.condition' => 'OK',
    'merchant.feedback' => 'positive',
    'user.refund_reason' => 'not happy with product'
  }
)

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

credit = balanced.Credit.fetch('/credits/CR6NpuEtezCdLTYngDrSEODv')
reversal = credit.reverse(
    amount=3000,
    description="Reversal for Order #1111",
    meta={
        "merchant.feedback": "positive",
        "user.refund_reason": "not happy with product",
        "fulfillment.item.condition": "OK",
    }
)

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/credits/CR5y9biY0Zr4Od8Jqu5DXimk').reversal({
    "amount": 3000, 
    "meta": {
        "merchant.feedback": "positive", 
        "user.refund_reason": "not happy with product", 
        "fulfillment.item.condition": "OK"
    }, 
    "description": "Reversal for Order #1111"
})

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Credit credit = new Credit("/credits/CR5j27kuJPX6voI8aokUWsEG");

HashMap<String, Object> meta = new HashMap<String, Object>();
meta.put("user.refund_reason", "not happy with product");
meta.put("merchant.feedback", "positive");
meta.put("fulfillment.item.condition", "OK");

HashMap<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 3000);
payload.put("description", "Reversal for Order #1111");
payload.put("meta", meta);

try {
    credit.reverse(payload);
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$credit = Balanced\Credit::get("/credits/CR40RpXNREGqn5Gl2swLfAQV");
$credit->reversals->create();

?>

Example Response

{
    "links": {
        "reversals.credit": "/credits/{reversals.credit}", 
        "reversals.events": "/reversals/{reversals.id}/events", 
        "reversals.order": "/orders/{reversals.order}"
    }, 
    "reversals": [
        {
            "amount": 3000, 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:13:20.975560Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "description": "Reversal for Order #1111", 
            "failure_reason": null, 
            "failure_reason_code": null, 
            "href": "/reversals/RV5zkhVPNqGRLTrYgzOZOSOs", 
            "id": "RV5zkhVPNqGRLTrYgzOZOSOs", 
            "links": {
                "credit": "CR5y9biY0Zr4Od8Jqu5DXimk", 
                "order": null
            }, 
            "meta": {
                "fulfillment.item.condition": "OK", 
                "merchant.feedback": "positive", 
                "user.refund_reason": "not happy with product"
            }, 
            "status": "succeeded", 
            "transaction_number": "RV146-123-6152", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:13:21.982342Z"
        }
    ]
}

Fetch a Reversal∵

Fetch a previously created reversal.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/reversals/:reversal_id

Balanced::Reversal.fetch

balanced.Reversal.fetch()

balanced.get()

Refund(String uri)

Balanced\Reversal::get()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/reversals/RV5zkhVPNqGRLTrYgzOZOSOs \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

reversal = Balanced::Reversal.fetch('/reversals/RVmcR4FZ5HLHkFEg38wsf9B')

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

refund = balanced.Reversal.fetch('/reversals/RV6OCxJ1UhkG84is6H9PHjkZ')

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/reversals/RV5zkhVPNqGRLTrYgzOZOSOs')

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Reversal reversal = new Reversal("/reversals/RV5h1LgxTlH1OtHAZEfQbvbH");

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

Balanced\Reversal::get("/reversals/RV41Rl7KRvK6mgXfGRzXsgwF");

?>

Example Response

{
    "links": {
        "reversals.credit": "/credits/{reversals.credit}", 
        "reversals.events": "/reversals/{reversals.id}/events", 
        "reversals.order": "/orders/{reversals.order}"
    }, 
    "reversals": [
        {
            "amount": 3000, 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:13:20.975560Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "description": "Reversal for Order #1111", 
            "failure_reason": null, 
            "failure_reason_code": null, 
            "href": "/reversals/RV5zkhVPNqGRLTrYgzOZOSOs", 
            "id": "RV5zkhVPNqGRLTrYgzOZOSOs", 
            "links": {
                "credit": "CR5y9biY0Zr4Od8Jqu5DXimk", 
                "order": null
            }, 
            "meta": {
                "fulfillment.item.condition": "OK", 
                "merchant.feedback": "positive", 
                "user.refund_reason": "not happy with product"
            }, 
            "status": "succeeded", 
            "transaction_number": "RV146-123-6152", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:13:21.982342Z"
        }
    ]
}

List All Reversals∵

Returns a list of all previously created reversal. The reversals are returned in sorted order, with the most recent reversals appearing first.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/reversals

Balanced::Reversal.all

balanced.Reversal.query()

balanced.marketplace.reversals

Reversal.Collection(String uri)

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->reversals

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/reversals \
      -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
      -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL:

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

reversals = Balanced::Reversal.all

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

reversals = balanced.Reversal.query

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.marketplace.reversals

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Reversal.Collection reversals = new Reversal.Collection(Reversal.resource_href);

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$marketplace->reversals->query()->all();

?>

Example Response

{
    "links": {
        "reversals.credit": "/credits/{reversals.credit}", 
        "reversals.events": "/reversals/{reversals.id}/events", 
        "reversals.order": "/orders/{reversals.order}"
    }, 
    "meta": {
        "first": "/reversals?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "href": "/reversals?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "last": "/reversals?limit=10&offset=0", 
        "limit": 10, 
        "next": null, 
        "offset": 0, 
        "previous": null, 
        "total": 1
    }, 
    "reversals": [
        {
            "amount": 3000, 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:13:20.975560Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "description": "Reversal for Order #1111", 
            "failure_reason": null, 
            "failure_reason_code": null, 
            "href": "/reversals/RV5zkhVPNqGRLTrYgzOZOSOs", 
            "id": "RV5zkhVPNqGRLTrYgzOZOSOs", 
            "links": {
                "credit": "CR5y9biY0Zr4Od8Jqu5DXimk", 
                "order": null
            }, 
            "meta": {
                "fulfillment.item.condition": "OK", 
                "merchant.feedback": "positive", 
                "user.refund_reason": "not happy with product"
            }, 
            "status": "succeeded", 
            "transaction_number": "RV146-123-6152", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:13:21.982342Z"
        }
    ]
}

Update a Reversal∵

Updates information on a reversal.

description
required string. Free-text description of the reversal for the dashboard.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/reversals/:reversal_id

Balanced::Reversal.save

balanced.Reversal().save()

balanced.get().save()

Reversal().save()

Balanced\Reversal->save()

Example Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/reversals/RV5zkhVPNqGRLTrYgzOZOSOs \
     -H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json;revision=1.1" \
     -u ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "description=update this description" \
     -d "meta[user.satisfaction]=6" \
     -d "meta[refund.reason]=user not happy with product" \
     -d "meta[user.notes]=very polite on the phone"

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-KpEgsMpSFwzAvYlXHB93rcjPDKYFviQ1')

reversal = Balanced::Reversal.fetch('/reversals/RVmcR4FZ5HLHkFEg38wsf9B')
reversal.description = 'update this description'
reversal.meta = {
    'refund.reason' => 'user not happy with product',
    'user.notes' => 'very polite on the phone',
    'user.satisfaction' => '6'
}
reversal.save

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-2ADpvITfpgBn8uBzEGsQ2bIgWaftUWiul')

reversal = balanced.Reversal.fetch('/reversals/RV6OCxJ1UhkG84is6H9PHjkZ')
reversal.description = 'update this description'
reversal.meta = {
  'user.refund.count': '3',
  'refund.reason': 'user not happy with product',
  'user.notes': 'very polite on the phone',
}
reversal.save()

var balanced = require('balanced-official');

balanced.configure('ak-test-1pRsPki9kvFvTP1B0JzJRWX4JPFLJkMWL');

balanced.get('/reversals/RV5zkhVPNqGRLTrYgzOZOSOs')
    .set('meta.extra', 'info')
    .save()

Balanced.configure("ak-test-2cSDy37BKy5K4NUHKHVNXNTjTHPEqjRtB");

Reversal reversal = new Reversal("/reversals/RV5h1LgxTlH1OtHAZEfQbvbH");

Map<String, String> meta = new HashMap<String, String>();
meta.put("reversal.reason", "user not happy with product");
meta.put("user.notes", "very polite on the phone");
meta.put("user.satisfaction", "6");

reversal.meta = meta;
reversal.description = "update this description";

try {
    reversal.save();
}
catch (HTTPError e) {}

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-Hznf9GhTb2Xkj7fGwVD6lZSMH5F1eTRl";

$reversal = Balanced\Reversal::get("/reversals/RV41Rl7KRvK6mgXfGRzXsgwF");
$reversal->description = 'update this description';
$reversal->meta = array(
    "refund.reason" => "user not happy with product",
    "user.notes" => "very polite on the phone",
    "user.satisfaction" => "6",
);
$reversal->save();

?>

Example Response

{
    "links": {
        "reversals.credit": "/credits/{reversals.credit}", 
        "reversals.events": "/reversals/{reversals.id}/events", 
        "reversals.order": "/orders/{reversals.order}"
    }, 
    "reversals": [
        {
            "amount": 3000, 
            "created_at": "2014-03-27T16:13:20.975560Z", 
            "currency": "USD", 
            "description": "update this description", 
            "failure_reason": null, 
            "failure_reason_code": null, 
            "href": "/reversals/RV5zkhVPNqGRLTrYgzOZOSOs", 
            "id": "RV5zkhVPNqGRLTrYgzOZOSOs", 
            "links": {
                "credit": "CR5y9biY0Zr4Od8Jqu5DXimk", 
                "order": null
            }, 
            "meta": {
                "refund.reason": "user not happy with product", 
                "user.notes": "very polite on the phone", 
                "user.satisfaction": "6"
            }, 
            "status": "succeeded", 
            "transaction_number": "RV146-123-6152", 
            "updated_at": "2014-03-27T16:13:26.263087Z"
        }
    ]
}
